name: Stick Brawl
description:
Kill waves of sticks, ride blobs and stay alive as long as you can!

In this game you're a stickman who fights waves of other sticks. You start barehanded. Once you defeat one of the enemies he'll drop his weapon and you'll be able to collect it. Other enemies may also drop extra health kits and money bonuses. Your only goal is to stay alive! Good luck and have fun!
